tag_list: cloud, mobile, social, local, web3-0, sap, ecommerce
overview:
CEO and Chairman of the Board of coresystems and Mila

Mila was established by cloud business application pioneer Manuel Grenacher. Under his leadership, coresystems maintains its position as the fastest growing cloud application provider for businesses with an annual growth rate of 50%.

With a proven track record for his vision and leadership, Manuel’s achievements have been recognized by Gartner, CIO magazine, The Deutsche Telecom innovation awards and the Swiss economic council.
